member.name: M:Sandbox.Internal.ReflectionSystem.AddDynamicAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Add an assembly which can be removed and hotloaded

member.name: M:Sandbox.Internal.ReflectionSystem.AddStaticAssembly(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Add an assembly which isn't going to change ( ie Sandbox.Game )
